optimizations.description: Potential missing index for column "measured_at" in table "health_measurements"
optimizations.impact: Queries on this column may cause full table scans
optimizations.suggestedFix: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_health_measurements_measured_at ON health_measurements (measured_at);
